GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/review_id.description: serves an object of a specific review

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

PATCH /api/reviews/review_id.description: returns the patched review showing the new vote count
PATCH /api/reviews/review_id.requestBodyAccepts: an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote }. { inc_votes : 1 } would increment the current review's vote property by 1. While { inc_votes : -100 } would decrement the current review's vote property by 100

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments belonging to a specific review

exampleResponse.author: mallionaire
exampleResponse.body: Now this is a story all about how, board games turned my life upside down

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: allows you to post a comment to a specific review and returns that new comment for confirmation
POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.requestBodyAccepts: an object with the following properties {username: 'exampleUsername', body: 'exampleCommentBody'}

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id

GET /api/users.description: returns an array of objects each with the property of username
